title: Eating Out
description: Samantha Baker isn't interested in being another notch on Ryan Fellows bedpost, but she can't deny he's got style, charisma, and prowess. When he invites her to have lunch, she finds she can't ignore the way his eyes caress her, nor the way he seems to know exactly what she needs...Eating Out is a wicked hot, short and steamy, office fling. The perfect length to read on your lunch break.Contains references to light BDSM in the form of a spanking, and Samantha must call Ryan "Sir".A Guaranteed 'Hot Lunch'
author: E.R. Pierce
